column3:
â€œThis is a fantastic Sativa that is deceptively strong. The smells of its parents are quite strong, with the Cheese and PIneapple parents standing out in the scent. The unmistakable skunk is sort of a subtle background player on this one, and that's not necessarily a bad thing (since it allows the pineapple, in particular, to stand out).

The effects are definitely Sativa. It's a creeper - when you first hit it, you f...â€

â€œI suffer from degenerative joint disease in both knees caused by osteoarthritis and picked up an eighth of this strain on the recommendation of the budtender at the Medicinal Oasis in Denver. I used a DaVinci vape the first couple of times I tried it and smoked it the third.

The first time I used it was after a day of hiking and my knees at a pain level of 7 on a scale of 1 to 10. Within about 5 minutes of using it,...â€
â€œi think i time traveled.â€

â€œGreat energetic body high with a heavy stone head high.
Waves of euphoria pulsate through your body.
The scent of the herb is like a sweet fruit candies.
And earthy minty overtones. Lung expansion felt.
Long lasting burn in joints/blunts. Great in a vaporizer.
A bit of throat harshness similiar to Trainwreck.
Effects instantly onset, didn't feel like a creeper.
Excellent pain relief, excellent euphoric energet...â€

â€œAlthough there are many strains out there with intense highs, Pineapple Chunk is similar, but the reason I have given it such a rating is not due to the fact the high is intense but the high itself, smoking this strain offers the best high of all the buds I've smoked and I've smoked plenty, it relaxes you, makes you chilled, happy, really intense giggles and super super highâ€
â€œThe pain killing property's for this strain are incredible. The high hits hard fairly quickly and the taste is phenomenal. A complete full body high.â€

â€œNot that it matters but got a couple of Grams that was on the $15 dollar shelf at the shop.  First pull off the bud was quite awesome with sweet pungent fruity scents and a touch of sweet pineapple.  Smells so good you will want to eat it!  Smokes a little fast but very smooth on in and out with a grilled pineapple taste that made my mouth water a bit.  Heavy duty body buzz at first with a high head buzz but not to f...â€
â€œPineapple Chunk is a GREAT strain! I highly recommend this strain to all Indica lovers as this strain puts you in a very good narcotic stone. Huge beautiful chunks of Bud, that smells AMAZING!â€

â€œTried every pineapple strain but this one up to this point.

Smoked the flower pineapple chunk - SO SO SMelly - sweet and pungent.

Good lord, This shit will get you  HIGH. 
Im a medical patient and try every new strain I find, for those who sometimes find it hard to get high after being a daily user - this is your jolt of re freshness.â€

â€œThis strain was my first medical pick up.  I have chronic pain, muscle spasms and depression.  I got a 1/2 O from BostonCana.  The first thing I noticed was the trim and production of my pic up was outstanding.  The grow they have going on at Boston Cana is awesome.  I'm sleeping again, I used to have trouble getting out of bed in the mornings,  but a wake and bake with this stuff puts you on your feet with a smile a...â€

â€œYum.  My god this strain tastes good.  Like spicy pineapple. :)

Really great strain all around, great for stomach and muscular pain in my experience.  It chills me out, but doesn't make me sleepy. 

Definitely a favorite.â€
â€œGreat heavy hitting indica. Dab before bed to help sleep or use during the day for a relaxing couch lock.â€

â€œAmazing medicinal strain. Makes me really happy & relaxed. Great for pain as well. I have fibromyalgia, depression, anxiety and PTSD - and Pineapple Chunk is effective in treating all of them. My fibromyalgia was acting up but when I smoked this it immediately started to melt away. A great balanced hybrid. Has a sweet, fruity & pineapple flavor profile, as its name suggests. You can smell the pineapple in the leaves ...â€

â€œğŸğŸğŸPineapple Chunk is a great hybrid strain!!! I found it a very chatty buzz  which I thoroughly enjoy...very uppity and then brings you down to a nice relaxing high in a smooth transition.  When I see any strains by Barneys Farm I buy them and love them.  ğŸğŸğŸâ€
â€œFelt a huge buzz of energy, now lying here one hour later in couchlock but huge uplifted mood and amazing head high overallâ€

â€œI don't why, but when I smoke pineapple chunk, I find myself watching over-the-top action movies, while standing. That's to say, I can't help but stand up, through an entire movie. 

I don't find this strain to be energizing, but rather calming and curious. The strain is also conducive to calling up friends with business proposals and the fleeting need to bake cookies. 

I guess what I'm trying to say is--Pineapple C...â€

â€œğŸğŸğŸPineapple Chunk is a great hybrid strain!!! I found it a very chatty buzz  which I thoroughly enjoy...very uppity and then brings you down to a nice relaxing high in a smooth transition.  When I see any strains by Barneys Farm I buy them and love them.  ğŸğŸğŸâ€

â€œAt Amnesia AMS with vape at 188. Soft fluffy nugs, lots of trichromes under the mic. Strong pine and fruit smell, mello and smooth vapor with candy-piney taste. A bit of berry mixed in.

Clearly indica effects, likely 300 mikes in 2 bags and still absolutely zero cerebral effect. Muscles relaxed, calm, content.â€
â€œThis is one of my main strains that I use daily. The smell brings me back to my Maui roots, and the high is a perfect mixture of gotta get shit done"
column5: I'm really chilled out". It is a wonderful mood enhancer. I use it to combat my mood swings from my anti-seizure meds. If I had to pick one strain for the rest of life

column3: â€œThis smells like all of its parents combined: pineapple, cheese and skunk. It's a decent hybrid.â€

â€œMade me relaxed  & lazy but not in a bad way. Pain relief, calming, no headache. I'm a medical user. I am trying to find the right one and looking for pain relief, mood lifting, and maybe a little energy.  For me, this is only for nighttime.â€
â€œExperienced increased heart rate and a very cerebral high.  Interesting for an indica as I was up most of the night.â€

â€œPinapple chunk is a wonderful strain great for anytime of the day and the terpers smell amazing and taste greatâ€

â€œPretty damn nice herb! Just grew out 3 of these for 10 weeks even though you could of had them at 8. One came out really pineapply, one really cheesy and one more like the original skunk weed. All were delicious crystal coated dense mid-size nuggets of heavily milky-frosted, velvety green buds with rusty yellowy, orange hairs. The effect is strong and happy and the flavour is awesome - like a pineapple and cheese sti...â€

â€œThis is my New Favorite. It is miss named though I am thinking more cobra venom. The nugs are full of THC crystals smelling slightly of citrus. I made Ice cube from Red Bull and dropped into my ice catcher. I immediately felt the smoke filling my lungs to capacity, then came the expansion and coughing. Too big a hit. I can feel the euphoria starting to over take my head by the second hit. Anyone with ADHD I would rec...â€

â€œvery nice strain a hardhitter even for me a cannabis grower for many years it blew my fucking sooks of very strong indica i think the yield is okay because of the quality of herb nice taste very good strain for new growers easy to handle and resin monster if the temperature i right if you have problems sleeping try this strain it will knock you on your ass...much respekt too barnes farm Joe CPHâ€

â€œPineapple Chunk has a sweet aroma with skunky undertones. The smell is pretty potent, but ultimately pleasant.

This strain produces an incredibly potent head high. The first half an hour of the high, I was engrossed in an amazing state of euphoria complete with some mild visual hallucinations. After that first wave passed, I was left in a pleasant, relaxed state. This entire high felt amazing. The intense head rush ...â€

â€œVery pretty flower with rich tones vibrant orange greens and deep purple. I was surprised that it tasted nothing like citrus tangy pineapple. On the contrary the flower smokes so smooth that you have to search through the earthy tones for the sweet finish. A great day smoke an exceptional wake and bake for and all day dose of peace. Noticeable body high with great pain relief and all day boost of happiness. Helps to ...â€

â€œThis is the strain that you keep inside hour modified life alert necklace. 

After spending a day with my friend and her five kids, I feel like I have fallen and I can't get up.

This sticky icky will make you forget  all about them kids after about ten min. This stuff is like a fancy drink at TGifridays. You have two and can't feel nothing, then bam! You are ordering ten entrees and getting white girl wasted like yo...â€

Smoked this one, its a bit trippy, if you have anxiety dont use this cause it will creep the shit out of you. Take it easy on and you''ll be good for the evening. I recommend this for late night sessions, because the effects are calm. A hard hitting indica what leaves you on the...â€

â€œFat dense buds that are a beautiful green, covered in long bright orange and yellow calyxes. The plant produced some very legendary sized buds. The smell is tropical and spicy, with a slight pungency. The flavor was sweet and skunky. Very smooth. It had a thick dense smoke, that was delicious on the exhale. The high was incredible. Very intense and euphoric. As an experienced smoker, I can honestly say this strain wa...â€

â€œI just tried this last week and it was a very different experience than I am used to. I felt focused, calm, but motivated to do things. I'm used to weed relaxing me, and this felt more like a firm but gentle push to get my shit together. It was odd, but not unpleasant. Don't smoke if you want a calm and relaxing evening, smoke if you want to clean your house and listen to music and make do some meal prep.â€

â€œThis review is for Blue Pineapple Chunk (Blue Dream x Pineapple Chunk). I'm leaving the review here since that particular strain doesn't have it's own leafly page yet.
This strain is the absolute shit. It looks beautiful, tastes great, isn't too harsh of a smoke, and it's one of the more relaxing sativa dominant strains that I've experienced in my 8 years of smoking. I find it to be a fairly focused high that's been ...â€

Don't smoke if you want a calm and relaxing evening, smoke if you want to clean your house and listen to music and make do some meal prep.â€

â€œI'm still smiling.

I like that in a strain. it lifted my spirits immediately. It also knocked out my migraine. I mixed it 50/50 with Harle-Tsu for added pain relief and because the CBD takes edge off of racing heart and anxiety. 

The taste is great, like a pinata colada, with a nice aroma--you can smell the funky cheese but it's just enough to keep it interesting. I really love it.â€

â€œif you had to pick only one strain to grow this would be it it is a good Indica sativa with more sativa characteristic than indica what I mean is you can smoke this in the morning and smoke it all day long and get a lot of stuff done it is a very good motivating strain very productive and you focus and you get a little bit of pain pill with this as well don't recommend smoking this at night to relax or wine down in f...â€
â€œGreat for relaxing and just being happyâ€

â€œdone a couple these last year and absolutely loved the cheesy pineapple mix of tastes and smells. a glorious bouquet. mad awesome THC levels and one that can put you to sleep fast. the leafly review says some report a jolt of sativa-esque raciness but really only if you wake and bake it. used at night it can sleep your ass good. a true pleasure 10/10 -El Kevoâ€

â€œGreat stuff. I picked up half an ounce of this stuff at Backwood Cannabis Company and is absolutely worth the price. I rolled one gram in a joint and just puffed on it without even lighting it, and the taste comng off it was straight pineapples. You really want to eat it, it smells so good. 

But overall this stuff has really great body Affects, made me feel like i was floating in space when i closed my eyes and oret...â€

â€œJust got it from Amsterdam.I travelled 12 hours from  Amsterdam to home, first thing I did is, roll one up and get high. By the time I finished my joint. My fatigue and stress was already finished.â€

â€œPicked this up based only on the name as I love the fruity strains. You can really smell the fruit and cheese combination, very pungent. The buds were nothing special to look at but this strain was all about the taste. If you are familiar with the cheese strain it's very similar but with a hint of pineapple on the exhale, very nice. Effects were very sativa leaning to me, big head rush for the first 20-30 mins before...â€
â€œThe smell is jaw-dropping, like pina colada and cheese, while the high is strong in both body and mind.  Superb.â€
â€œThe perfect strain if you want that Indica full body effect, while still the Sativa uplift. In other words it knocks you out and keeps you going at the same time". hahaâ€"

â€œVery head high kind of strain. Grew out 5 phenos of the plant and they're all consistent in terms of results. Little in terms of body feeling and not much pain relief. I think it's a milder sativa feeling but gives me brain confusion like not many other strains do. Basically when I have it, I'm wishing I was having something else even though the quality of the plant is there. It simply doesn't work for me in either a...â€
â€œI always keep some of this around! Sweet and skunky. This strain will make any person happy for sure.â€

â€œRoughly a 4.5, whatever, It fits my style!  Nice hybrid that I found sativa-leaning effect. Nice smooth fruity and citrus smell. Tastey but not mouth watering. As for the feel: an immediate cerebral the effect that gives some energy, then quickly gives way to relaxing and focused body and state of mind.lasts an hourish in small/regular size doses.  Very pleasant!!â€

â€œThis is the one that knocked me on my butt. In addition to full-body pulses of feeling, I could witness a blurry slideshow of a psychedelic trip if I surrounded myself in complete darkness. Therefore, it should be highly recommended for use in a sensory deprivation tank.â€

â€œ****Everyday Seasoned Toker****


Pineapple Chunk

-Huge chunks out of the bag. 
-Smells like cheese and pineapple. 
-Heart rate increase immediately while smoking (125 BPM+)
-Feels heavy in the eyes. 
-Focused, anxious, high HR, heavy stone but not fuzzy. 

Was a top shelf strain ($225 oz.) and I would buy again. This strain could make for some amazing edibles as it hits pretty hard!â€

â€œSo far this is one of my favorites! Hits fast and hard, I get a little anxiety early on but I know within 10-15 minutes I will be relaxed and able to enjoy the relaxing yet cerebral buzz. Tastes great and smooth smoking as well.â€

â€œTo Pineapple Chunk is Outstanding, great strong smell of pineapple, sweet taste. A very good Hybrid, flowers look real nice. After smoking you'll get a very good buzz, lol that hair rising tingly feeling A ratingâ€

If it doesnâ€™t smell like pineapple syrup itâ€™s not this strain. A light smoke with heavy taste. PC gives me great euphoria, uplifting, and did I say very tasty? A nice middle ground of energy and relaxation. Itâ€™s almost all in the head, and mind. Itâ€™s not ...â€

â€œStrong stuff. Goes straight to your head, and your body follows the chillout soon after. Definitely don't need much! I'd use this at night, I think.â€

â€œA light strain, not too energetic but not too tiered.  Really is in between of a sativa or indica.  Not bad for a quarter of a day until you start feeling a little lazy.â€

â€œgood strain. sweet taste with a very quick high. worked faster then sour Diesel to me but my opinion. I personally didn't feel any pain relief but my bottle says it has THC only no cbd. purchased this at my Anna location so they do have it. plus if you are a member then an ounce is 250.00 until March 4 2017 so I may be back soon..to early to tell if I like it that much.â€

â€œAmazing high. I'm still high and I smoked this over 2 hours ago. It's a very spaced out high, kind of third person almost. Definate couch lock but that's accompanied by a very cerebral high that allows you to take all the energy that you don't use moving around, and focus it on whatever you're thinking about. Great weed to watch a movie on.â€

â€œ****Everyday Seasoned Toker****


Pineapple Chunk

-Huge chunks out of the bag. 
-Smells like cheese and pineapple. 
-Heart rate increase immediately while smoking (125 BPM+)
-Feels heavy in the eyes. 
-Focused, anxious, high HR, heavy stone but not fuzzy. 

Was a top shelf strain ($225 oz.) and I would buy again. This strain could make for some amazing edibles as it hits pretty hard!â€
